column4: i try to copy a disk with dd, but i get 'no space left on device' even though i just formatted the drive and it's big enough, what did i do wrong ?
Make sure the secondary drive is at least as big or bigger.
the the destination drive must be bigger than the actual source drive, or just the source partition ?
I think dd does whole drives, not just partitions.
ok thanks, have to look for a bigger drive then...
